name: College BBALL Coach
description:
Be a college basketball coach in this unique entertainment sim!
You could actually call College BBALL Coach an "Entertainment Sim" of sorts. You'll manage your team, recruit new players, play over 20 practice drills and simulate your game outcomes based on how well your gameplan and players match up against opposing teams.

Pretty simple, but you'll see that it can be quite fun and challenging when it comes down to it! Do you have what it takes to win a National Championship, coach? Let's find out!

*** After over a year in design, development and testing, I'm proud to bring this great game to all of the college basketball fans out there! Please enjoy the game and share any ideas, feedback or bugs (hey, I'm human after all) that you encounter to help make this the best game it can be! Thanks and welcome to College BBALL Coach!
